articles.description: Defending champions England are left with work to do to qualify for the Women's 2025 European Championships after an "unnecessary" defeat by France in Newcastle.
articles.title: Women's Euro 2025 qualifying: England have work to do after 'unnecessary' France defeat

articles.description: Third seed Carlos Alcaraz reaches the French Open last 16 with a solid straight-set win against Sebastian Korda.
articles.title: French Open 2024: Carlos Alcaraz beats Sebastian Korda

articles.description: The 18-year-old Chechen wanted to attack a football stadium in Saint-Étienne, officials say.
articles.title: Paris 2024: Police arrest man planning attack on Olympics stadium

articles.description: Real Madrid boss Carlo Ancelotti say his players will feel the “fear” of the Champions League final when they face Borussia Dortmund at Wembley.
articles.title: Champions League final preview: Real Madrid players will feel the 'fear' against Borussia Dortmund - Ancelotti
